title: Mixhug Decorative Linen Throw Pillow Covers, Farmhouse Cushion Covers for Couch and Bed, Red, 24 x 24 Inches, Set of 2
features: MATERIAL - Linen polyester blend in a slubbed weave.
PACKAGING - Pack of 2 pillow covers without inserts.

CLASSIC AND LIVEABLE - The textured throw pillow cases are detailed with smooth hidden zipper in a matching color for a stylish look. The delicate workmanship makes them more durable. Toss the solid pillow covers on the sofa, chair or bed to add instant luxury accent to your decor.

AESTHETIC DECORATION FOR HOME - Soft texture and vintage color suits rustic rooms as well as modern organic spaces. Our chic and comfortable pillow cover makes a fascinating addition to your living room and bedroom.
CARE INSTRACTIONS - Machine wash cold separately. Gentle Cycle. Do not bleach. Do not iron.
description: Start with the basics, and build up your pillow mix. Our linen pillow cover brings a touch of richness and simple elegance to any room.
Machine wash cold separatelyGentle CycleDo not bleachDo not iron
